definition: difference/discrepancy/to differ/error/to err/to make a mistake
to differ from/to fall short of/lacking/wrong/inferior/Taiwan pr. [cha1]
strong/powerful/better/slightly more than/vigorous/violent/best in their category, e.g. see 百強|百强[bai3 qiang2]
to force/to compel/to strive/to make an effort
Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]

sentences.english: Over all, Egypt’s competitiveness is mediocre but not terrible.
sentences.chinese: 總體來說，埃及的競爭力差強人意，但也不算太糟。
他們的表演尚差強人意。

sentences.english: Are you a passable guitar player?
sentences.chinese: 你是個差強人意的吉他手嗎？

sentences.english: Many of Ozawa's ideas have been overshadowed by his poor image.
sentences.chinese: 許多小澤的構想因爲他差強人意的形象而失去了光彩。

sentences.english: In truth, the GPEI has not done badly.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，GPEI沒有做也並非差強人意。

sentences.english: The film Mr. Bean was a box-office success, but it was not much praised by the critics.
sentences.chinese: 電影豆子先生是一部大賣片，不過影評差強人意。

sentences.english: Sex addicts also have poor discernment skills for choosing boyfriends.
sentences.chinese: 同時，性上癮患者甄別合適男友的能力也差強人意。

sentences.english: Others play truant because the teaching is truly dissatisfactory.
sentences.chinese: 而另一些學生逃課則是因爲教學實在是過於差強人意。

sentences.english: The efficiency of this organization was sufficient probably 15 years ago.
sentences.chinese: 這種組織效率在15年前也許還差強人意。

definition: lit. to draw a gourd from the model (idiom)/fig. to copy sth mechanically without attempt at originality
Hong Kong Wetland Park, in Yuen Long, New Territories
pinyin: Xiang1 gang3 Shi1 di4 Gong1 yuan2

definition: to churn out large quantities without regard for quality (idiom); rough and slipshod work
to be nothing to write home about (idiom)
unprecedented and never to be duplicated/the first and the last/unmatched/unique
(idiom) to use methods appropriate to the current situation
